description: Dark-haired cutie Damon Heart got up to take a shower, and to his misfortune, it sprung a bad leak. His bad luck soon turns into double relief when he opens the door to find dark and handsome Lucas Fox is the plumber! He can’t believe his eyes, and can barely put his words together. Strapping Lucas heads into the bathroom to fix the issue while athletic Damon waits on the couch. Damon nods off, and ends up having a wild dream about tattooed Lucas wearing leather, and banging him bent over doggystyle.
title: Day Dream Fuck
